entry.title: Catgirl & Goblin at Time Warp
entry.content:
I won on BK:SOW like once and then it was all over. Then we gooned at the kitty loft.

[[carousel:label=Catgirl and Goblin photo set; media/images/tw-catgirl-and-goblin (1).avif|we horsin' around 🐴; media/images/tw-catgirl-and-goblin (2).avif|😈♥😺; media/images/tw-catgirl-and-goblin (3).avif|👀; media/images/tw-catgirl-and-goblin (4).avif|Smooch!!! 😮; media/images/tw-catgirl-and-goblin (5).avif|the end.]] 5 images

entry.title: #2 on Stranger Things 💩
entry.summary: Got this a few days ago. Check out the big bonus 🍆🍆🍆
entry.content:
I got total isolation #2 which I'm not sure I've ever done before. Also felt pretty close to getting 11 drawings. [[video:stranger-things-elo]]

I keep telling Catgirl how important the rollovers are. [[video:stranger-things-bonus]]

entry.title: 1.2B on GZ & Planet X Qualified
entry.content:
I saw a tech messing with it a few weeks ago due to a switch being stuck down causing scores to go up continually, so I assume they reset it. 1.2B is good for me but won't last.

I beat Titanosaurous, Gigan, and Ghidorah I think, but didn't get much on the Ghidora fight. Then Monster Zero started before Planet X, which I don't actually know how to start. Pretty nice to feel like it's close though.

117M Carnage was pretty good too 😈

[[video:gz-gc-shortys]]

entry.title: Thresher
entry.content:
Finally caught thresher shark on Jaws. On to whatever the last one is, and great white.

[[video:jaws-hs]]
